snippet.title: The Hayseed Knight v1.5 - Wishlist on Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Join a ragtag band of misfits as they piece together how Ader, a one-eyed farmboy with seemingly impossible dreams, becomes the most celebrated knight the kingdom of Acazhor has ever known. 

This gorgeous, animated visual novel unravels in unexpected ways with a perfect blend of mystery, comedy and romance!


Wishlist The Hayseed Knight on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1332990/The_Hayseed_Knight


Trailer Edition, French Translation: Benjamin Beziat https://twitter.com/SireRed
List of Voice Actors: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt10928036/

Music: 
Ader's Theme - Saad Ali

Rampi Rampi - TURKU Nomads of the Silk Road


Turku, Nomads of the Silk Road's songs are licensed under an Attribution License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/


Everything else: Maxi/Sandra Molina Juan




The Hayseed Knight © 2017 Sandra Molina Juan
